modify.description: Bank statements for the last 3 months. Credit card statements are also accepted as supporting proof.

steps_flow.title: Fill Application Form
steps_flow.description: Complete the Schengen Visa application form for Greece.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a slot with GVC World (Official partner for Greece in India).

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit documents and biometrics at the GVC World center.
